entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Ronge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Ronge Airport 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow at times heavy over southern sections late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
